content.p: With increasing world population and declining natural resources and arable land, we use innovative biotechnological tools to improve genetic resources, create predictive modelling and develop diagnostic kits and biosensors. We strive to diversify food and feed sources to alleviate over reliance on the existing resources. We adopt inter- and multidisplinary approaches with the incorporation of computing, environmental science and engineering technologies to face changing world challenges and industrial demands. Our research theme focusses on the following 2 aims: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
